description:
Sexy Cameron Adams goes up against tough guy Martin Lorenzo this week. This is Cameron's first time on NK, but he comes with a lot of confidence and plans to use the strength of his strong muscular legs to take down his opponent. With a record of 2:1, Martin is considered a veteran on NK. He returns this week, looking leaner and sexier than ever, with the intention of using his endurance to walk away with another win. Both guys are hot, muscular and ready to do what it takes to make the other swallow his cock and be his bottom bitch for the day! Who will it be this week?
PS: Cameron's second match was with Gianni Luca.
title: Cameron Adams vs Martin Lorenzo
